title: How many states did Frederick Douglass have a home in? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: How many states did Fredrick Douglass have a home in? Well technically speaking he had homes in Washington D.C.; Rochester, New York; and Baltimore, Maryland, but he had stayed in many other places that were not his home in his lifetime. Hope I helped in someway, Aurora
